name: Coderlift Product Page Booster
author: CoderLift

sections.description:
If Woocommerce shop owner wants to put some extra information or any type of data just after the cart to inhance the user experience which could be useful for increasing the sales, then this plugin is best.
This will add an extra field in product adding page in backend and the data will be showen in single product page just after the cart button.
sections.installation: Upload the Coderlift Product Page Booster plugin to your Woocommerce site, Activate it, and enjoy.
sections.faq:
What does actually do it?

This plugin will create extra field to your product page that will increase user experience and boost your sales.

How to use it?

Just very simple install the plugin and look at your product adding editor, you will get some extra fields to input. You can check our Documentation

Is it will add the inquiry form in bottom tab area?

We are very helpful, just Email us: coderlift@gmail.com and we will prompt reply.

short_description: Coderlift Product Page Booster plugin will add an extra field to add content after the cart in single product page
